decks.notes: The main concept of this deck revolves around assembling the Dark Depths combo, using cards like Crop Rotation, Green Sun's Zenith, and Elvish Reclaimer to search for and put Dark Depths onto the battlefield. Once Dark Depths is in play, the deck aims to use Thespian's Stage to copy it, creating a powerful 20/20 Marit Lage token. The deck also includes cards like Knight of the Reliquary and Mox Diamond for additional utility and mana acceleration. The goal is to quickly assemble the combo and overwhelm the opponent with a massive flying indestructible creature.

This deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by utilizing counterspells and targeted discard spells, while applying pressure with efficient creatures and removal spells. By controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's resources, the deck can maintain tempo and dictate the pace of the game. The key strategy is to protect your threats, disrupt the opponent's game plan, and close out the game quickly before the opponent has a chance to recover. With a mix of disruption, efficient creatures, and powerful spells, this deck aims to control the game and come out on top.

This deck focuses on utilizing the powerful Eldrazi creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By ramping up mana with cards like Eye of Ugin and Eldrazi Temple, the deck can play large threats like It That Heralds the End and Thought-Knot Seer early in the game. Chalice of the Void helps control the opponent's spells, while cards like Lotus Petal and Once Upon a Time provide additional consistency and speed. With a mix of mana acceleration, disruptive elements, and powerful creatures, this deck aims to apply early pressure and close out the game quickly.

The main concept of this Dragon Stompy deck is to disrupt the opponent's mana base with cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon, while quickly deploying powerful threats like Pyrogoyf and Broadside Bombardiers. The deck aims to apply pressure early on and prevent the opponent from developing their game plan by utilizing powerful lock pieces. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of disruptive elements and aggressive creatures, ultimately leading to a quick victory through tempo advantage and efficient card choices.

The deck focuses on utilizing the Reanimate and Animate Dead spells to bring powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier back from the graveyard to the battlefield quickly. The deck also includes cards like Entomb and Brainstorm to set up the graveyard, as well as disruption spells like Daze and Force of Will to protect the combo. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Wasteland and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan and maintain control of the game while executing the combo.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide, while disrupting opponents with Blood Moon and Sundering Eruption. It also takes advantage of powerful Dragons like Fury and Pyrogoyf to apply pressure and end the game swiftly. The inclusion of cards like The One Ring and Laelia, the Blade Reforged give the deck additional versatility and power, enhancing its aggressive playstyle. Ultimately, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with its fast, aggressive gameplay and powerful threats.

The deck focuses on generating massive amounts of mana through artifact synergy and card draw to assemble a game-winning combo involving Paradox Engine, Aetherflux Reservoir, and various baubles and artifacts. This combo allows the player to continuously cast spells and trigger the abilities of their artifacts, ultimately leading to a powerful storm finish. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will to protect the combo and ensure a smooth path to victory. The key strategy is to maximize the value of artifacts and take advantage of their synergies to create a powerful and deadly combo.
